name: nwd
description: pure node.js implementation of Selenium WebDriver Wire Protocol
author: 2do2go team <dev.2do2go@gmail.com>

scripts.testPhantom: { phantomjs --webdriver 127.0.0.1:4444 --ignore-ssl-errors yes > ./phantomjs.log 2>&1 & } && ID=$! && echo 'Wait for phantom start...' && while [ "`grep 'running on port' ./phantomjs.log`" = "" ]; do sleep 0.1; done && npm run test; kill $ID
